title: Exogenous Data in Forecasting: FARM -- An Approach for Relevance Evaluation. (arXiv:2304.11028v1 [eess.SP])
abstract: Exogenous data is believed to play a key role for increasing forecasting accuracy. For an appropriate selection, a throughout relevance analysis is a fundamental first step, starting from the exogenous data similarity with the reference time series. Inspired by existing metrics for time series similarity, we introduce a new approach named FARM - Forward Angular Relevance Measure, able to effectively deal with real-time data streams. Our forward method relies on an angular feature that compares changes in subsequent data points to align time-warped series in an efficient way. The proposed algorithm combines local and global measures to provide a balanced relevance measure. This results in considering also partial, intermediate matches as relevant indicators for exogenous data series significance. translated_title: 预测中的外在数据：一种用于关联评估的FARM方法
translated_abstract: 外在数据被认为在提高预测准确性方面起着关键作用。针对恰当的选择，全面的相关性分析是一个基本的第一步，从外在数据与参考时间序列的相似性开始。受现有时间序列相似性指标的启发，我们介绍了一种名为FARM（前向角相关度量）的新方法，能够有效地处理实时数据流。我们的前向方法依赖于一种角度特征，该特征利用后续数据点的变化比较来对齐经过时间变形的序列。所提出的算法结合了本地和全局指标，提供了一个平衡的相关性度量。这导致将部分、中间匹配也视为外在数据序列重要指标的考虑因素。作为第一步验证，我们介绍了我们的FARM方法对合成但具有代表性的信号和真实世界时间序列记录的应用。同时展示了FARM方法提高了预测准确度的结果。
tldr: 该论文介绍了一种名为FARM的方法，用于有效处理实时数据流并提供平衡的相关性度量，进而确定外部数据在预测中的重要性。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces a new approach called FARM, which efficiently deals with real-time data streams and provides a balanced relevance measure to determine the importance of exogenous data in forecasting.
